text: Erik Duval (11 September 1965 â€“ 12 March 2016) was a Belgian scientist. Duval chaired the informatics section of the computer science department of the Katholieke Universiteit Leuven. He also chaired the research unit on human- computer interaction. Duval died in Antwerp, Belgium from non-Hodgkin lymphoma at the age of 50. He was elected a member of the Academia Europaea in 2009. ==References== Category:1965 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Belgian scientists Category:Computer scientists Category:Members of Academia Europaea Category:Deaths from non-Hodgkin lymphoma Category:People from Antwerp (province)
title: Erik Duval
